sentences.sContent: It is the centrepiece of Doha's outstanding waterfront landmark, the West Bay business and residential complex.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is the centrepiece of Doha's outstanding waterfront landmark, the West Bay business and residential complex.
sentences.sCn: 这是多哈的具有里程碑意义的杰出海滨，西湾商业及住宅区的中心。

sentences.sContent: This report describes the open space recreational design vision for the waterfront park of the new economic and technical development zone (ETDZ).
sentences.sContent_eng: This report describes the open space recreational design vision for the waterfront park of the new economic and technical development zone (ETDZ).
sentences.sCn: 本报告描绘了新经济技术开发区（ETDZ）开放的海滨公园是休闲景观规划设计构想蓝图。

remMethod.val: water(水) + front(前沿) → 水的前沿 → 水边 → 海滨
